title: What comes to mind when you hear the word 'work'? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’re welcome. #notsorry SkinBone on Instagram: “EVERYBODY GO CRAZY WHEN THIS SONG COME ON SkinBone on Instagram: “I REALLY CAN MILLYROCK TO ANY SONG SERIOUSLY SkinBone is a raw comic out of Chicago. Don’t judge.

Well, “fun” was already taken. But before that, I thought of 2 words: “I wish.” Even though I worked for 50 years, I still look forward to working in horticulture one way or another. Retirement is not in my vocabulary. For now, helping take care of my mother is a priority, although I will continue to develop my garden blog, wellspringkim.com. Decades ago, I spoke with a business consultant, who said, “The worst day working for yourself is better than the best day working for someone else.” That sums it up or me. I enjoyed self-employment for 40 years. Even though there were very difficult times (recessions), I wouldn’t have traded it for anything. You have to love what you do, because too much time is spent doing it!
